00030 namespace BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE {
00031   template<> struct hash< std::string >  {
00032     size_t operator()( const std::string& x ) const {
00033       return hash< const char* >()( x.c_str() );
00034     }
00035   };
00036 #if defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__i386__)
00037   template<> struct hash< uint64_t > {
00038     size_t operator()( const uint64_t val ) const {
00039       return size_t(val);
00040     }
00041   };
00042 #endif
00043 }

00046 struct lt_cstr {
00047   bool operator()(const char* s1, const char* s2) const {
00048     return strcmp(s1, s2) < 0;
00049   }
00050 };

00052 inline std::string operator+( const std::string& s1, short sval ) {
00053   char cbuf[8];
00054   sprintf(cbuf, "%d", sval);
00055   return s1 + cbuf;
00056 }
